sentences.en: In a wetland, or in dense growth, you are very hard to spot.
sentences.cn: 在湿地或茂密的植物中，你很难被发现。

sentences.en: On November 9, 2014, the International Marathon was held at Xichang Qionghai Lake Wetland.
sentences.cn: 2014年11月9日，国际马拉松赛在西昌琼海湿地举行。

sentences.en: More important for our discussion, wetland areas support a lot more varieties of life than swiftly flowing water.
sentences.cn: 更重要的是，湿地地区，与流动的水域相比，能供养更多种类的生命。
